name: IT380_Sprint2-Prototype
description:
The reason for this project is to create a simple learning experience for artists as Anatomy is the most important part to learn for any artist. My goals are to help amateur or even professional artist understand in much more detail how parts of the body move and for which reason they move in relation to the muscles, ultimately allowing students learn how the muscles interact with one another in motion which must other programs do not have. 

Controls:

Left-click: navigate UI

Right-click: rotate(future)
